snippet.title: Tastrion - Trailer - 2024
snippet.description:
Tastrion is a 90's inspired SHMUP set in a hostile planet covered with rampant mutating organisms that fuse tissue with machinery, you are the pilot of a powerful gunship titled ''The Desolazor'' built to annihilate the growing threat to the galaxy.

This game features 6 levels with increasing difficulty, 12 unique bosses that will test your skills, and multiple pickup power-ups that increase your weapon efficiency, survivability, and capability to outlast the onslaught.

Tastrion is currently aimed to be released 2024 and to offer a fun SHMUP experience for both newcomers and old-school fans.

Old demo at Itch.Io page - https://magnaremora.itch.io/tastrion-demo

Now available on Steam for wishlist 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2720360/Tastrion/
